AuthorityBridge.logDespatchIgnited: Official communication process initiated for authority {target}.
AuthorityBridge.logDespatchSuccess: Institutional Success: Document {identifier} sealed and despatched via {channel}.
AuthorityBridge.errorProviderFailure: Institutional bridge failure: Provider {provider} rejected document despatch.
AuthorityBridge.auditImpactReport: Regional impact in {region} consolidated with {count} verified signatures.
